title: salty m9
body: well salt here we go salt salt salt is all i see on the boards these days why talk about it it'll never do anything it will just get the salty people more mad y'know so theres no real reason chatting about it we all have been salty time from time come on an i know salty people need to grow the fuck up an play for fun an stuff but all of u players im grateful for the staff an the players all of u are very nice to me (the ones ive spoken to XD) but early marry Christmas y'all have fun an stay safe all of u XD

replies.body: Borborkbork aborkaborka salt on mah borkaborka est makesh thesh besch selt borkborkbork

Grammar mother fucker, do you know it?

OK, I understand what you are trying to say, but let me state this.

Why do you think we are salty? Why do you think we come here and complain?

Players in game can be asses, that we know, players in game can also have the "I don't care" attitude.

If we complain in game they will report us, we will get banned, so we come here. Instead of us getting banned, we come here and try to let Rito know that we are unhappy and things need to be done, otherwise they assume it is mostly OK and do nothing, well they do nothing mostly anyway, but at least we are pre-warning them that when it gets too bad we will walk out.
